discover_music_data_on_the_web.title: Discover music data on the Web
discover_music_data_on_the_web.description: musoW is a catalogue of musical resources available on the web realized with the idea to support teachers in music education, creative industries, historians, and musicologists in finding what they need.

dynamic_elements.text: Let's explore some data through the use of several charts.

dynamic_elements.chart_query: PREFIX musow: <https://w3id.org/musow/vocab/> SELECT ?x (COUNT(?content) AS ?y) WHERE { {?content ?p musow:repository . musow:repository rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:catalogue . musow:catalogue rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:dataset . musow:dataset rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:digital-library . musow:digital-library rdfs:label ?x .} UNION {?content ?p musow:software . musow:software rdfs:label ?x .} } GROUP BY ?x
SELECT ?x (COUNT(?x) AS ?y) WHERE { { SELECT ?time (DAY(?time) AS ?x) WHERE { ?entry <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#generatedAtTime> ?time . } } } GROUP BY ?x ORDER BY ?x

explore_another_possibility.title: Explore Another Possibility
explore_another_possibility.description:
Wikidata is a free and open knowledge base that can be read and edited by both humans and machines.
Wikidata acts as central storage for the structured data of its Wikimedia sister projects including Wikipedia, Wikivoyage, Wiktionary, Wikisource, and others.

Wikidata also provides support to many other sites and services beyond just Wikimedia projects! The content of Wikidata is available under a free license, exported using standard formats, and can be interlinked to other open data sets on the linked data web.
explore_another_possibility.decription: Wikidata is a free and open knowledge base that can be read and edited by both humans and machines.Wikidata acts as central storage for the structured data of its Wikimedia sister projects including Wikipedia, Wikivoyage, Wiktionary, Wikisource, and others.Wikidata also provides support to many other sites and services beyond just Wikimedia projects! The content of Wikidata is available under a free license, exported using standard formats, and can be interlinked to other open data sets on the linked data web.

dynamic_elements.text: 2. Smetti di arrestare gente a caso.
